title: Bug 116564: Hyperlink builder title changes with settings
OB: When clicking on the 'OK' button and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the title of the hyperlink builder changes to 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the settings.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Click on the 'OK' button.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
